contents.text: Thank you for calling Thalmic Labs in San Francisco, where we pioneer wearable technologies that transform how you interact with computers.
For device setup and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support specialist.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot my new wearable’s setup and connectivity issues immediately
I need help troubleshooting my MYO armband’s connection and calibration on my PC.
Diagnose and recalibrate the IMU sensors on my Myo armband after the latest firmware update
I need help setting up my new wearable device and connecting it to my computer.
I need assistance calibrating my Thalmic armband for precise muscle signal readings in my physics lab experiment.

contents.text: For warranty and repair status, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve your warranty and repair information.

navigationGoals: Verify the warranty coverage and current repair status of my device
I'd like an update on the warranty repair status of my sent-in gesture control device.
Retrieve the RMA number and current warranty repair status for my malfunctioning Myo device
I’d like to check the warranty repair status of the device I sent in.
I’d like to check the warranty coverage and current repair status for my faulty Myo armband.

contents.text: For sales and product information, press 2.
For product catalog and pricing, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our sales team for detailed product information.

navigationGoals: Obtain a detailed product catalog with pricing for your latest wearables
I'm interested in getting a price list and catalog for your wearable devices.
Obtain the detailed technical spec sheet and per-unit pricing for the upcoming Myo release
I want to review the product catalog and pricing to choose the right model.
I’m comparing Thalmic armband models for a research project and need detailed specifications and pricing information.

contents.text: For bulk orders and partnership inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our partnerships and bulk order team.

navigationGoals: Explore bulk purchasing options and partnership opportunities for my company
I want to discuss bulk ordering armbands for my veterans’ support group program.
Discuss enterprise bulk-order discounts and OEM partnership requirements for integrating Myo into our product line
I’m looking into bulk ordering multiple devices for my senior center and need pricing details.
I’m interested in placing a bulk order of armbands for a university physics lab and would like to discuss partnership and discount options.
